page.title: 09 The Church Hall
page.content:
The Church Hall, Christ Church Walmersley, which used to be the old school is now being renovated.
It is used by many groups including, Sunday School,Young Wives,Keep-Fit, Friendship Club,Mothers Union, Mother & Toddler Group, Cubs, Scouts, Venture Scouts, Brownies, Guides, and a pre-school play group. Social activities include Fun Day, Bring & Buy, Winter Market and refreshment for activities in the church.
The Glorybutts Theatre Group also meets in the hall. The group gets its name from an archery practice ground behind the Walmersley Arms pub used by archers at the battle of Agincourt.
Catherine Howell 11
